:v-model.description: If the default value is the name of a radio, the radio will be selected by default
:v-model.description_zh: 被选中radio双向绑定的值，如果初始值为某一个radio的name，该radio将会默认被选中

label-disabled.description: Whether to prohibit clicking on the text to operate the radio
label-disabled.description_zh: 是否禁止点击文本操作radio

active-color.description: When selected, the color is applied to all child Radio components
active-color.description_zh: 选中时的颜色，应用到所有子Radio组件

size.description: The overall size of the radio component, in rpx

width.description: The width of the radio needs to be with units, such as 50%, 150rpx

wrap.description: Whether each radio occupies a row

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the status of any radio changes
events.description_zh: 任一个radio状态发生变化时触发
events.params: name: 值为radio通过props传递的name值
